text:
Borys Yevhenovych Paton (; 27 November 1918 – 19 August 2020) was a Ukrainian scientist. He was the chairman of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine. He was appointed to this post in 1962. He was known for his works in electric welding. He was born in Kyiv.
Paton died on 19 August 2020 in Kyiv at the age of 101.
